headline: Stronger Results, BTIG Deal and Capital Moves Could Be A Game Changer For U.S. Bancorp (USB)
summary: In January 2026, U.S. Bancorp reported stronger fourth-quarter and full-year 2025 results, with higher net interest income, net income, and earnings per share versus the prior year, while also completing two US$1.00–US$1.25 billion callable, fixed-to-floating senior note offerings and finishing a share repurchase program totaling 13,737,131 shares for US$587.99 million. Together with its pending acquisition of brokerage BTIG for up to US$1.00 billion, these actions highlight U.S. Bancorp’s...
